Sections.SectionText: Who left my trusty crossbow lying on the ground?
I'll stash this in my pack in case I need it.
The crossbow has been added to your backpack on the right. To use an item during combat, click on the item.
To use an item outside of combat, also click on the item. After you use item out of combat, it's gone forever.
This is a great way to clear up space in your pack.
It's also a great way to lose weight!
